name: Masternaut UK
overview:
Masternaut UK Limited, doing business as Masternaut Three X, provides vehicle tracking and mobile solutions in the United Kingdom and Europe. It offers planning, tracking, and reporting solutions that enable to plan and schedule routes, track vehicles, deliveries and jobs, and communicate with mobile workers on the road. The companyâ€™s products include a M-Vehicle Tracking solution for monitoring driver position, progress, and hours; M-Hourtrak, a solution to record and monitor driver hours; M-Messenger that provides updates and alerts; M-Reports that provide reports of vehicle and driver activity, automated weekly timesheets, and reports detailing excessive time spent; M-Routing and Scheduling that enables automatic scheduling; M-Delivery, a planning software for vehicle and load management; M-Mobile Applications that provide contact between base and driver; and M-Navigation that offers voiced turn-by-turn directions, traffic alerts, and alternative route option for unexpected incidents. It also provides solutions, such as X-Schedule, a planning solution for increasing productivity; X-Service, a Web delivered service management solution; and X-Service Pro, a back-office integrated service management solution. It serves various industrial sectors, such as courier and express services, local government, sales and marketing, waste management, recovery, rail maintenance, distribution and logistics, service and maintenance, and newspaper distribution.

Masternaut UK Limited was formerly known as Live Reply Ltd. and changed its name in September 2002. Masternaut UK Limited was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Leeds, the United Kingdom with additional offices in France and Europe. As of December 1, 2009, Masternaut UK Limited operates as a subsidiary of Masternaut International.
